The VIVO Ontology

We are learning about Sphinx and ReadTheDocs, and considering their use for creating documentation for the VIVO Ontology and related ontologies.

One need is to provide search and index capability at the term level. A user should be able to find the documentation for date or person or publication without difficulty.

Sphinx is semantic â€“ it fully separates document content and structure from document presentation. Writers deal only with structure. Stylesheets deal with presentation.
